strapiJob.title: Grazologist
strapiJob.description:
Graze Craze Bentonville is one of the most dynamic and exciting new food brands in the marketplace today. Our high-end charcuterie take-out food service concept is currently expanding throughout the US and abroad. Graze Craze is looking for Professional and driven minded people with EXCELLENT Customer service skills to join our team as Grazologist (Charcuterie board prep staff) Full Time, Part- Time & Summer Internship opportunities available.

Artfully decorate and arrange our unique take on catering and made to order charcuterie boards & boxes.

Maintain safe food handling and storing practices (temp logs, proper food rotation).

Inventory / supply management

Ability to stand for extended periods of time.

Ensure each board is held to our high-quality standards of visual & edible perfection.

Maintain clean & sanitized prep area & lobby.

Did we mention provide- AMAZING customer service!   

Seeking-Creative minds, Dependable, Detail oriented, Customer focused team members.   

Additional tasks as needed.

On the job training provided

*Must be Legally able to work within the State and Federal guidelines. Valid driverâ€™s license and clean driving record.
